name: IOHIDInterface
desc: A provider object for a HID device's interface.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the interface.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the interface.

items.name: - Open
items.desc: Opens a session to the device and begins the delivery of input reports.

items.name: - Close
items.desc: Closes the interface and stops the delivery of input reports.

items.name: - ReportAvailable
items.desc: Notifies the interface that an updated report is available from the HID device.

items.name: - AddReportToPool
items.desc: Adds a memory descriptor to the report pool.

items.name: - processReport
items.desc: Parses the contents of the specified report and updates the interface's elements.

items.name: - GetReport
items.desc: Retrieves a new input report from the HID device.

items.name: - SetReport
items.desc: Sends a report to the HID device.

items.name: - getElements
items.desc: Returns the array of elements that the interface uses to store parsed report data.

items.name: - commitElements
items.desc: Gets or sets the contents of the interface's stored elements.
